rows.label: bf05320100_0020
rows.name:
Exposed to wind and rain, without restoration,
it still boasts the brilliance of its time.

rows.label: bf05320100_0040
rows.name:
I often wonder if we are growing as
a people... or in fact, regressing.

rows.label: bf05320100_0060
rows.name:
I'm surprised. You haven't changed at
all. Don't people find that strange?

rows.label: bf05320100_0070
rows.name:
I am Acedian, and the Driver of an
Holy Grail. It keeps me young.

rows.label: bf05320100_0100
rows.name:
You never intended to let
anyone go there, right?

rows.label: bf05320100_0110
rows.name: People change with the turning of time.

rows.label: bf05320100_0130
rows.name:
I would like to believe there is one who
can reach God and save this dying world.

rows.label: bf05320100_0140
rows.name: Is it wrong to think that?

rows.label: bf05320100_0160
rows.name:
The fact that he resonated with you,
doesn't that mean exactly that?
